title: You Are Mine
overview: In Xia's company office, where good looks are common, new employee Shun-Yu Yao is different. He's happy about his chance to join the great company, but he doesn't realize that Shang-Zhou Xia will tease him endlessly. Despite tough work and a grumpy boss, Shun-Yu believes he can handle it for a better life. But dealing with a blind date with the boss and sharing a bed turns out to be more than he bargained for!
